  • Method Details

    • formatLabel

      public static String formatLabel(String message, String spanClass, int length)
      Function that split a message that we want display in a label to avoid to exceed the panel and create a popup size issue
      Parameters:
      message - The message to format
      spanClass - The span class (label-warning, label-important...)
      length - The max length of the message
      Returns:
      The formatted message

    • getContextParent

      public static <T> T getContextParent(com.axelor.rpc.Context context, Class<T> klass, int depth)
      Function that returns the object instance corresponding to a certain depth of parent contexts
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the desired parent
      Parameters:
      context - The context from which to get the parent
      klass - The class of the desired parent
      depth - The depth from which to get the parent
      Returns:
      The desired parent, or null if it doesn't exist or is of a different class

    • getFieldFromContextParent

      public static <T> T getFieldFromContextParent(com.axelor.rpc.Context context, String fieldName, Class<T> klass)
      Function that returns the object instance of the desired field from the context or all its parents
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the desired field
      Parameters:
      context - The context
      fieldName - The field name in the context
      klass - The class of the desired field
      Returns:
      The desired field, or null if it doesn't exist

    • getOriginParent

      public static <T> T getOriginParent(com.axelor.rpc.Context context, Class<T> parentClass)
      Function that returns the very first parent of the current context
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the desired parent
      Parameters:
      context - The context
      parentClass - The class of the desired parent
      Returns:
      The very first parent of the current context
